body.name: BELLEZE Sideboard Buffet Cabinet, Modern Wood Glass-Buffet-Sideboard with Storage, Console Table for Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, Hallway, or Entrance - Brixston (Brown)
features: [MODERN DESIGN] Stylish design with clean lines, mixed color accents, and golden alloy handles give this buffet cabinet a contemporary appeal with a decorative touch. Measures 64"L x 15.75"W x 32"H with a capacity of 70 lbs.

[MULTIPURPOSE SIDE CONSOLE TABLE] Can be used as an entryway cupboard, or as a buffet or serving table in your kitchen or dining room. Place it in your bedroom for a stylish flair and to store your bed linen and extra pillows.

[SPACIOUS STORAGE] From fine china and utensils to kitchenware and bed linen, this buffet cabinet gives you ample space. Two glass-enclosed cabinets with built-in adjustable shelves allow you to customize the storage space to match your needs.

[STURDY CONSTRUCTION] Built for long-lasting durability thanks to the strong manufactured wood construction. This hardy wooden cupboard server is fitted with tempered glass cabinet doors that are shatter and break-resistant.

[GLASS DISPLAY CABINET] Framed with glass doors, this wood buffet sideboard also doubles as an elegant display unit, allowing you to show off your treasured collectibles, nostalgic memorabilia, and high-end kitchenware that's sure to impress your guests.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: White Sideboard Buffet Cabinet with Glass Door Brown Sideboard Buffet Cabinet with Glass Door

64 Inches Sideboard Buffet Cabinet with Glass Door This console boasts large storage, thanks to two cabinets featuring adjustable shelves that allow you to customize the storage space as per your needs.Sturdy manufactured wood construction offers long-lasting durability and tempered glass cabinet doors are shatter and break resistant.This unit is also fitted with anti-tipping brackets to prevent the table from accidentally toppling over for a safer environment for you and your family.

Glass Buffet Sideboard Three adjustable height of levesls to suit your item size. A modern design blends beautifully with a wood finish and gold-toned metal handles, delivering a subtle decorative effect that grounds your decor in elegance. This buffet console table can also be used as an entryway or hallway console or as a storage cabinet/dresser in your bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value for money
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. It is shorter than expected and the door hinges were a bit of a pain to install. But this is well worth the money, great quality and looks beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this Tv stand. It looks like a much more expensive piece of furniture. It was not really hard to put together, we had a broken hinge & the company was super responsive & sent a new hardware kit. Once I got that fixed,the doors didn't line up & one looks too tall, the company offered me a partial refund. They were very responsive & helpful to my issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't come with instructions.
reviews.reviewText: It looks good. The particle board (MDF) is good and the vinyl laminate covering is a good quality.I did not recieve assembly instructions, but I went to the Belleze web site and looked-up the product then found a link to the manual and downloaded the .pdf file. I took a couple of 5 minute breaks and it took me 2.5 hours by myself to assemble. Easy to assemble and the instructions only had 1 mistake. The packaging was good. Nothing was marrred or broken. Plenty of hardware and some extra.I asssembled the entire unit with my long handled phillips screwdriver and the allen wrench they provided with the hardware kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes a while to put together
reviews.reviewText: With time and patience the furniture looks beautiful once it was done and serves its purpose well. And the price was great. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great with UST Projector
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use with my Epson LS800 Ultra short throw projector. It fits perfectly and had plenty of room left on top to fit an Xbox and a headset stand.Each shelf on the bottom has a cut out on the back to run wires, so additional game consoles or home theater equipment works well with the bottom compartments.I love the look. The assembly was not too difficult. It just took time. The build quality is good for the price and with proper care, should hold up for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, hope you can read instructions
reviews.reviewText: It’s beautiful, but definitely felt times vibes putting all the pieces together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavy and strong, but…
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised to see how well this was packaged! The box was big and really heavy. Poor delivery guy dragged it! Lol Good thing it did not got damaged in the process.The good: looks nice for the price, and took us about 2.5 hours to assemble, but only because we missed on the manual that there are 2 kinds of hinges! So pay extra attention to those final steps where you have to assemble the doors. Manual was easy to read and understand.I am rating a 3 and not a 5 star because the doors look really cheap compared to the rest of the piece.The last pictures show what i mean by that.**** UPDATE: Tried to have doors replaced, so I contacted the seller. We got a quick response, and although they could not send us new doors, they worked with us and we are now satisfied with the outcome.So my conclusion is: if you are okay with the quality of the doors, this is a pretty good deal. Unit is heavy and sturdy otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, price, and customer service
reviews.reviewText: I’m usually hesitant to buy furniture online from companies I don’t know but after reading other reviews I decided it was worth it. This piece is great quality, feels very sturdy, and looks far more expensive than it was.The only trouble I had while putting it together was that the spots for the door hinges to be screwed in to the cabinet were too far in to work but it was easy to screw them in slightly closer to the edge and you would never notice now.Two months later I noticed a bubbling on the side that looked like there was a gouge underneath. I reached out to belleze and they were extremely helpful and quick and shipped out a replacement for that piece. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy more from them after the experience.
